title: 38.) Top 40 Countdown - I Think About My Husband's Affair Every Day
description:
Ashley's husband cheated on her before they had their second child together, and she finds herself obsessing over whether he will do it again. - Dr. Laura: "Be pleasant and focused on creating a non-contentious home, and you'll reduce the chance of betrayal." 

Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
